price: 3. Улар ғойибга ишонадиган, намозни тўкис адо этадиган ва биз ризқ қилиб берган нарсалардан инфоқ-эҳсон қиладиган зотлардир.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
